official_title: A resolution concerning subpoenas duces tecum served upon various employees of the House in the case of Common Cause et al. against Bailar et al. (Civil Action Number 1887-73) pending in the United States Court for the District of Columbia.

summary.text: Concerns subpoenas duces tecum served upon various employees of the House in the case of Common Cause et. al. against Bailar et. al. (Civil Action Number 1887-73) pending in the United States Court for the District of Columbia.
